plays.text: Bench penalty to Atlanta 2 minutes for Too Many Men on the Ice(served by Rich Peverley)
Power Play Goal Scored by Steve Downie (Wristshot 14 ft) assisted by Ryan Malone and Brett Clark
Goal scored by Dominic Moore (Wristshot 25 ft) assisted by Teddy Purcell and Sean Bergenheim

Power Play Goal Scored by Vincent Lecavalier (Slapshot 59 ft) assisted by Martin St. Louis and Steven Stamkos
Goal scored by Steven Stamkos (Tip-In 18 ft) assisted by Victor Hedman and Steve Downie
Penalty to Brett Clark 2 minutes for Interference Niclas Bergfors
Penalty to Chris Thorburn 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Steve Downie
Penalty to Steve Downie 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Chris Thorburn
Penalty to Victor Hedman 2 minutes for Holding Evander Kane
Penalty to Pavel Kubina 2 minutes for Interference Evander Kane
Penalty to Ron Hainsey 2 minutes for Holding Steve Downie
Penalty to Victor Hedman 2 minutes for Tripping Alexander Burmistrov
Penalty to Dominic Moore 2 minutes for Goalkeeper Interference Chris Mason
Power Play Goal Scored by Tobias Enstrom (Slapshot 58 ft) assisted by Niclas Bergfors and Andrew Ladd
Goal scored by Ben Eager (Snapshot 36 ft)
Penalty to Vincent Lecavalier 2 minutes for High-sticking Ben Eager
Goal scored by Chris Thorburn (Wristshot 16 ft) assisted by Brent Sopel and Ben Eager
Goal scored by Steven Stamkos (Tip-In 15 ft)
Penalty to Dustin Byfuglien 2 minutes for Interference Simon Gagne
Penalty to Ben Eager 2 minutes for Roughing Martin St. Louis
